what.title: What is Wazzat?
what.description: With Wazzat you give every project or product a digital passport. Document what you install with photos and notes, save documents and find everything quickly. Less administration, more time for your craft.

share.title: 3. Forget until you need it

euBadge.title: EU Digital Product Passport
euBadge.description: The EU Digital Product Passport is a digital system that stores and shares product information across the value chain, making data accessible to consumers and businesses to promote sustainability and circular economy practices.

hero.title: Smart digital passports
hero.description: Effortlessly connect every product or project to a digital passport. Wazzat simplifies asset tracking, documentation, and full lifecycle service — making critical info instantly accessible for manufacturers, contractors, and service teams. Tags can be visible (QR) or invisible (NFC/RFID), enabling seamless access with any phone (no app required). Just scan and go—no more lost manuals or service history.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Use QR codes (visible) or NFC/RFID (invisible) to give your product a digital identity during the production or installation process.

link.title: Link
link.description: Link the tag to a (or a predefined) product or project and location. Products and projects can be imported from your ERP, CRM or existing backoffice.

track.title: Track
track.description: Add photos, notes, documents, more ... to create a complete digital passport with a full service history.

qr.title: QR Code Tracking
qr.description: Scan QR codes on equipment like water heaters to instantly access service history, documentation, and support options. No app download required.

nfc.title: NFC/RFID Tracking
nfc.description: Simply tap your phone on equipment with invisible NFC/RFID tags to instantly access service history, documentation, and support options.
